select
from syntax_topic st, syntax_unit_topic sut, knowledge_point kp where kp.id = st.knowledge_point_id and st.id = sut.topic_id and sut.unit_id = #{unitId} and kp.id not in ( select vocabulary_id from learn l where l.student_id = #{studentId} and l.unit_id = #{unitId} and l.study_model = '学语法' and l.type = 1 ) group by kp.id order by kp.id limit 1
